narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

currency.name: currency
currency.label: @currency
currency.hover_text: A three letter ISO 4217 code for the original currency of the amount. This is required for all currency amounts unless the iati-organisation/@default-currency attribute is specified. For more information

currency.name: currency
currency.label: @currency
currency.hover_text: A three letter ISO 4217 code for the original currency of the amount. This is required for all currency amounts unless the iati-organisation/@default-currency attribute is specified. For more information

lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

status.name: status
status.label: @status
status.hover_text: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country. This attribute is required. For more information

status.name: status
status.label: @status
status.hover_text: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country. This attribute is required. For more information

vocabulary.name: region_vocabulary
vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: An IATI code for the vocabulary from which the region code is drawn. If it is not present 1 - ‘OECD DAC’ is assumed. For more information

oecd_region_code.name: region_code
oecd_region_code.label: @code
oecd_region_code.hover_text: Either an OECD DAC or UN region code. Codelist is determined by vocabulary attribute. For more information

region_code.name: code
region_code.label: @code
region_code.hover_text: Either an OECD DAC or UN region code. Codelist is determined by vocabulary attribute. For more information

vocabulary-uri.name: vocabulary_uri
vocabulary-uri.label: @vocabulary-uri
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: The URI where this vocabulary is defined. If the vocabulary is 99 (reporting organisation), the URI where this internal vocabulary is defined. For more information
